usersPanel.administratorTooltip: Users with access to the administration console of this instance.
usersPanel.collaboratorTooltip: Internal users with the right to create rooms and invite users into them.
usersPanel.partnerTooltip: External users who have been invited to one or more rooms by an internal user and have limited rights.
usersPanel.pendingInvitationTooltip: Users who have been invited, but have not yet set their password or logged in.

roomsPanel.title: Rooms per type
roomsPanel.noRoomsMessageOne: This Watcha instance does not yet have some rooms.
roomsPanel.noRoomsMessageTwo: Return to Watcha to create a first room (button "+").
